channel.title: Digests on Thinking as Algorithm
channel.description: Recent content in Digests on Thinking as Algorithm

item.title: Digest 001
item.description: Articles Birds do have a brain cortex—and think Neuroscience | Source Neuroscience | Birds do have a brain cortex—and think Source This News and Views covers the following two research articles: A neural correlate of sensory consciousness in a corvid bird A cortex-like canonical circuit in the avian forebrain How I got into linguistics, and what I got out of it Memoroir | Source Memoroir | How I got into linguistics, and what I got out of it William Labov’s account of his research career: how did he become a sociolinguists, what did he do during the years, and how did he feel about his research career.
